comment._content: Linda fotografía ...... amo el Judo ...... y siendo un arte Japonés ....... es una herencia para el mundo y la humanidad ........ gracias Dr. Kano....... afectuosamente Daniel Marín Carbajal

comment.author: 91994044@N00
comment._content: Anton Geesink won a Gold Medal in the 1964 Olympics in Tokyo, proving for the first time that a Westerner could defeat a Japanese in the national sport of Japan.
